entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
